title: Black No.7 - Available now at MyFonts.com
content:
Inspired by the Jack Daniel’s Black Label Whiskey logo from 1866, the Black No.7 has over 400 glyphs including ligatures, alternates and special characters.  
 [Download](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012085241/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/typocalypse/black-no-7) the font for the price of a bottle Tennessee Whiskey.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012085241im_/http:/typophile.com/files/blackno7-01_5445.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012085241im_/http:/typophile.com/files/blackno-555_5772.jpg)

The Black No.7 has not been approved as official artwork by the company.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012085241im_/http:/typophile.com/files/blackno7-02_5943.jpg)
author: In Konfrontation
